title: Chickpea and fennel stew
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin chickpeas', '2.25L (4 pints) vegetable stock', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1kg (2 lb) tomatoes, chopped', 'handful fresh basil leaves, chopped', '1kg (2 lb) fennel bulbs, trimmed and chopped', '2 medium onions, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '150g (5 oz) frozen garden peas']
